couldNotGetResult.description: Report message when there is an error getting the HTML checker result
couldNotGetResult.message: Could not get results from HTML checker for '$1'. Error: '$2'.

description.message: Validate HTML using 'the Nu HTML checker'

errorGettingResult.description: Debug information to show when there is an error getting the HTML checker result
errorGettingResult.message: Error getting HTML checker result for $1.

errorReporting.description: Debug information to notify that there was a problem locating and reporting the result
errorReporting.message: Error reporting the HTML checker results.

receivedHTML.description: Debug information to notify that we have already received the result from the checker

waitingForHTMLResult.description: Debug information to show that we are waiting for the HTML checker result
waitingForHTMLResult.message: Waiting for HTML checker results for $1
